==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|しゅん|しゅう|k2=じゅう|r=y}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しゅんじゅう}} compound {{m|zh|春秋|tr=tsyhwin tshjuw|lit=spring and autumn}}. The [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']], so probably a shift in reading after initial borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|しゅんじゅう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=1|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しゅんじゅう}}

# [[spring]] and [[autumn]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=しゅんじゅう|metonym}} a [[year]]; {{qualifier|by extension}} one's [[age]]

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|しゅんじゅう}}

# the ''[[w:Spring and Autumn Annals|Spring and Autumn Annals]]'', the [[chronicle|chronicles]] of the [[ancient]] [[state|State]] of [[Lu]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|はる|あき}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=はるあき|春|tr1=haru|t1=spring|秋|tr2=aki|t2=autumn}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|はるあき|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|はるあき}}

# [[spring]] and [[autumn]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=しゅんじゅう|metonym}} a [[year]]; {{qualifier|by extension}} one's [[age]]
#* {{RQ:Hojoki}}
#*: {{lang|ja|四十あまりの'''春秋'''をおくれる間に}}
#*:: {{lang|ja|よんじゅう あまり の '''はるあき''' を おくれる あいだ に}}
#*:: ''yonjū amari no '''haruaki''' o okureru aida ni''
#*::: during the course of living some forty-odd '''years'''
